## 판결문 요약













                                                                                    NOS. 12-04-00068-CR
          12-04-00069-CR
          12-04-00070-CR
          12-04-00071-CR
          12-04-00072-CR
 
IN THE COURT OF APPEALS

TWELFTH COURT OF APPEALS DISTRICT

TYLER, TEXAS
PATRICK RANDALL POSTON,                      §                 APPEAL FROM THE THIRD
APPELLANT
 
V.                                                                         §                 JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT OF

THE STATE OF TEXAS,
APPELLEE                                                        §                 ANDERSON COUNTY, TEXAS
                                                                                                                                                            
MEMORANDUM OPINION
            Following a jury trial, Patrick Randall Poston (“Appellant”) was convicted of escape (12-04-00068-CR), three counts of aggravated robbery (12-04-00069-CR), unauthorized use of a motor
vehicle (12-04-00070-CR), burglary of a building (12-04-00071-CR), and theft (12-04-00072-CR). 
The jury sentenced Appellant to twenty years of imprisonment and assessed a $5,000.00 fine for the
theft conviction, forty years of imprisonment and a $2,500.00 fine on each count of aggravated
robbery, and two years of imprisonment on the unauthorized use of a motor vehicle, burglary of a
building, and theft convictions.  Appellant raises one issue on appeal...
